name: Dollyyy
greetingText: Tumhara naam hi itna pyara hai ki i like to say it again n again! :P
wishText: Wish you always stay smiling like that ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you Dollyy!! Many many happy returns of the day...
text2: Wait...you might be thinking ye to maine already kardia
text3: Fir what's all this and where the 'surprise'?? xD
text4: I realised, I always wanted to do something
outroText: And haan, i know ek baar dekhne se mann nahi bharega tumhara...
replayText: So, click here to watch it again.
